name: Inca Trail To Machu Picchu 2D/1N
description: This 2-day program covers 14 km Inca Trail, joining the classic 4-day route at the impressive archaeological site Wiñayhuyna. Continuing through the famous Inti Punku or Sun Gate, for the magnificent view of MachuPicchu for the first time as well as enjoying the sunset. Finally devoting the second day to the full day visit of world-famous Inca Citadel of MachuPicchu. This program is recommended for those having less time or those looking to hike a shorter version of the Inca Trail with out camping.
